executable.title: Spherical Harmonic coefficients To GFA
executable.description: calculate GFA from SH coefficients.\n\ Examples: \n\ SHCoefficientsToGFA eap_r0.015.nii.gz eap_r0.015_gfa.nii.gz

image.name: _InputSHFile
image.description: Input image file where each voxel contains a vector of SH coefficients.

image.name: _OutputFile
image.description: Output image file where each voxel contains a scalar GFA.

double.name: _Power
double.description: Power argument. If the power is 2, we have closed form. For other power number, we use a numerical fitting of the powered spherical function.
